response.original_title: Diário de um Compositor em Viagem
response.overview: The film follows the routine of composer Alexandre Guerra in the process of recording the soundtrack of a film, held in the cities of Budapest and Paris. Throughout the narrative, we follow the backstage of making music for cinema: the studio, the orchestra, the soloists and how the surroundings of the cities influence and interact with these forms of creative art.
response.title: Diário de um Compositor em Viagem
